full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GIS MDOS GLUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA MDOS GLUD 'BUL TSUL ZHES PA 'DI NI BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAntI TA'I SKU GZHOGS GRVA TSANG PHAN BDE GSANG SNGAGS GLING GI BSRID KYI BLO RIGS DANG LDAN DIM CHE AER TI NI TZAS @005B SAN BSKAL BZANG DGE LEGS DANG, JANG JONG CHEN WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS GSO CIS KYI BLO RIG PAS BRGYAN PA DIM CHE BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA NAN TAN CHEN POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRIL DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RJE DZA YI PAndI TA'I MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL PA, NYON MONGS KYI THAN DU GYUR BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON ZHES BGYE BAS SBYAR BA'I DI NI YIS GNAS SKABS DANG THAR THUG GI 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHOD KUN SEL ZHING RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO,, ,,)
